title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD Changes Report, Tue Jun 25 2024

Summary of BCD changes
from Tue Jun 18 2024 10:25:45 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue Jun 25 2024 20:30:19 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

Added Features: 23

Expand to see the full list

api

  1. AudioEncoder ➞ configure ➞ bitrateMode
  2. AudioEncoder ➞ configure ➞ opus
  3. AudioEncoder ➞ configure ➞ opus ➞ opus_application
  4. AudioEncoder ➞ configure ➞ opus ➞ opus_signal
  5. HTMLElement ➞ contentEditable ➞ plaintext-only
  6. SharedWorker ➞ SharedWorker ➞ options_type_parameter
  7. WorkerGlobalScope ➞ rejectionhandled_event
  8. WorkerGlobalScope ➞ unhandledrejection_event

css

  1. properties ➞ align-content ➞ multicol_context
  2. properties ➞ overflow-clip-margin ➞ border-box
  3. properties ➞ overflow-clip-margin ➞ content-box
  4. properties ➞ overflow-clip-margin ➞ padding-box

html

  1. global_attributes ➞ title ➞ multi-line_titles

http

  1. headers ➞ Content-Security-Policy ➞ form-action ➞ blocks_redirects
  2. status ➞ 408

mathml

  1. elements ➞ annotation
  2. elements ➞ annotation-xml
  3. elements ➞ mprescripts

webextensions

  1. api ➞ browserAction
  2. api ➞ runtime ➞ getContext
  3. manifest ➞ background ➞ preferred_environment
  4. manifest ➞ content_scripts ➞ css_origin
  5. manifest ➞ optional_permissions ➞ menus

Removed Features: 3

Expand to see the full list

api

  1. MouseEvent ➞ region

html

  1. global_attributes ➞ title ➞ multi-line-support

http

  1. headers ➞ Accept-CH-Lifetime

Implementation Status Changes: +108, -0

Added (108)

css

  1. types ➞ global_keywords ➞ revert-layer
    Added to Chrome, Safari  ➞  Now in 3 of 3 engines

http

  1. headers ➞ Access-Control-Allow-Headers ➞ wildcard
    Added to Safari  ➞  Now in 3 of 3 engines
  2. headers ➞ Access-Control-Allow-Methods ➞ wildcard
    Added to Safari  ➞  Now in 3 of 3 engines
  3. headers ➞ Authorization ➞ Digest ➞ SHA-256
    Added to Chrome  ➞  Now in 2 of 3 engines
